name: Big Game Trapper
summary: You can set snares specifically for big prey, leaving smaller creatures unscathed.
description:
You can set snares specifically for big prey, leaving smaller creatures unscathed. Each time you set a snare, you can choose Small, Medium, Large, or Huge. That snare can be triggered only by creatures of that size or larger.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
